description: Right in Abbotsford.  The main trails are wide and pretty easy, with some moderately steep sections.  There are several bridges, and rougher sections of trail.  Good for beginners.
directions: Park at the Ag Rec Center, then follow the trail near the parking lot entrance under the road.  Once you exit the tunnel, continue straight on the gravel path to enter the woods
title: Downes Bowl - north loop
